TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUriContext

summary.span: 表示一个服务，该服务可使用应用程序上下文将提供的相对 URI 解析成绝对 URI。

span.span: Represents a service that can use application context to resolve a provided relative URI to an absolute URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现作为服务来实现类型转换器可以使用可能导致无法完成的 URI 类型属性的特定于应用程序的上下文。 implemented as a service enables type converters to use an application-specific context that might be able to complete a URI-type property. 类型转换器和标记扩展可以查询有关作为上由 XAML 对象编写器，XAML 对象编写器调用值转换行为时提供的服务上下文的服务。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型转换器和 XAML 的标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[可供类型转换器和标记扩展的上下文服务](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). 不再仅仅用于值转换和服务上下文。 is not just for value conversion and service context. UI 元素或其他支持包含的类的类逻辑也可能实现服务可识别的模式的子元素可以调用基 URI 信息，或存储作为基从 XAML 获取的 URI 信息的分析根元素。Class logic for UI elements or other classes that support containment might also implement services as a recognized pattern that child elements can call for base URI information, or store base URI information that is obtained from XAML parsing of the root element. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此接口存在于 WPF 特定程序集 PresentationCore。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly PresentationCore. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 示例方案在 WPF 中存在。Example scenarios for exist in WPF. 例如，值转换器，类可以使用提供的属性如一个相对 URI ，如果作为上的服务可用输入。As an example of a value converter, the class can use a relative URI that is provided for properties such as , if is available as a service on the input. 元素大小写，例如实现，以便它可以传递基 URI 值分析时，它会修改。As an example of the element case, implements so that it can pass through base URI values when parsed, which then modifies .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ BaseUri { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当前应用程序上下文的基 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI of the current application context.

value.span: 应用程序上下文的基 URI。

span.span: The base URI of the application context.
